analysisEngineMetaData.name: TestElementAnnotator
analysisEngineMetaData.description: The system will read in the input Ô¨Åle as a UIMA CAS and annotate the question and answer spans. Each answer annotation will also record whether or not the answer is correct.

typeDescription.name: Types.TestElement.Question
typeDescription.description: Question being asked in sample information processing task.

typeDescription.name: Types.TestElement.Answer
typeDescription.description: Proposed answer to question being asked in sample information processing task.

featureDescription.name: IsCorrect
featureDescription.description: Boolean Flag indicating whether or not the proposed answer is correct.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: Answer score (assigned using Gold Answer Scoring System).

typeDescription.name: Types.BaseAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Common core attributes shared by all types.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence of the creator in the correctness of the output on a scale of 0 to 1.0.
